channel.title: [HELP] Adding Korasi sword model to my [PI] Server
channel.description:
Okay, I'm new at this stuff and I would really appreciate any help :D. I would love to add the korasi sword model here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,482027.0.html
How do I add this to my server? if anyone could please explain - thank you

item.title: [HELP] Adding Korasi sword model to my [PI] Server
item.dc:creator: @Eraa Eraa
item.description:
@Eraa wrote:

Okay so I vain I.
I’m not sure if i’m doing this right, But I wasn’t sure where to add the INT for korasi’s sword
So i got zfilesearcher and searched for the chaotic rapier id “15037” And i found it in “Item_Def2.java”, I then added the Korasi’s sword int or w.e it is, but I sort of copied from the Chaotic rapier one and just changed the model numbers

case 13739: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 54496; //drop model itemDef.anInt165 = 54496; //male wield model itemDef.anInt200 = 54496; //femArmModel itemDef.modelZoom = 1425; itemDef.aByte154 = -14; itemDef.modelRotationY = 498; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1300; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 9; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 13; itemDef.aByte154 = -14; itemDef.name = "Korasi's sword"; itemDef.description = "The sword of a void knight.".getBytes(); break;

Thats what I added & I compiled and received no errors, Now I go to the cache C:/DSPK the cache and I’m not sure where abouts to add the “Models” that I downloaded for korasi?
Where abouts do i add them, heres a link to the models i downloaded

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Please help I vain I, I know you are extremely talented and I just really need help

Read full topic

I’ve read & read ur tutorial but you are just to smart, I’m really asking for help and I don’t want to give up can you please help me Vain?
